org.eclipse.dataset.roi

Class PolygonalROI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.ROIBase
      • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.PointROI
        • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.PolylineROI
          • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.PolygonalROI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<IROI>, INameable, IPolylineROI, IROI

    public class PolygonalROI
extends PolylineROI
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for a polygonal ROI is a closed form of a polyline ROI (end point is implicitly the start point)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
